MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK2 postcode area of Falkirk, affecting customers on Bothkennar and the surrounding areas. Engineers are continuing to work on the overhead line near to Powfoulis Lodge and we still expect all power to be restored by 2am.  We understand that to be without power is frustrating and we apologise for this. We will update this message if this information changes. Thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:34pm on 6th November 2020.
